name: helpergithubgmail
title: Helper for GitHub notifications in Gmail
fullName: Helper for GitHub notifications in Gmail
description: Add links to GitHub threads and shortcuts to your Gmail interface.
author: Mu-An Chiou

preferences.name: Domains
preferences.title: Domains
preferences.description: Specify GitHub enterprise domain, or other domains you'd like to grab links for. There's no need to add github.com, protocol is also not required unless you'd like to be explicit.

preferences.name: Shortcut
preferences.title: Shortcut
preferences.description: The shortcut that triggers button clicking on the mail view.
